notes.text:
This update for amazon-ssm-agent fixes the following issues:

- Update to version 3.1.1260.0
- CVE-2022-29527: Fixed a bug which creates world-writable sudoers file during runtime. (bsc#1196556)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Amazon AWS amazon-ssm-agent before 3.1.1208.0 creates a world-writable sudoers file, which allows local attackers to inject Sudo rules and escalate privileges to root. This occurs in certain situations involving a race condition.
notes.title: CVE description
